DOC.brief_summary: TWEAK ( TNF weakly inducer apoptosis ) type II-transmembrane protein , member TNF ligand superfamily cleave function soluble cytokine . Depending target cell type , TWEAK trigger multiple cellular response range modulation inflammation cell death bind main receptor , Fn 14 . Our team first describe pro-inflammatory effect TWEAK central nervous system inflammation . Various data support possibility TWEAK produce synovial macrophage may contribute chronic synovitis animal model human . In psoriatic arthritis ( PsoA ) , anti-TNF therapy successful concord key role TNF pathogenesis disease generation psoriatic patient neutralize anti-TNF autoantibody refer `` beneficial autoimmunity pro-inflammatory mediator '' . In 2010 , Van Kuijk et al . describe high expression TWEAK inflammatory synovial PsoA rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) patient anti-TNF therapy . The role TNF-alpha regulation TWEAK expression remain unclear .
DOC.brief_title: Does Etanercept Influence Tweak Modulation Inflammation During Inflammatory Rheumatisms ( Psoriatic Arthritis Rheumatoid Arthritis ) ?
